snippet.title: SCALE Trailer #1 (OFFICIAL)
snippet.description:
The first trailer for our game SCALE! 

Preorder SCALE here: 
http://www.scale-game.com

Subscribe to our channel here:
http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX44o...

We regularly update our facebook page. Like it if you're into that kind of thing and want updates: https://www.facebook.com/home.php

Follow us on Twitter: 
Steve = https://twitter.com/SteveSwink
